column1: Urinary Tract Infection Prevention
column2: elaine6s, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have frequent uti's and i am on my second round of this drug. On my first round i felt a little bit better but not completely cured until the last day (2 pills for 10 days). Now I'm starting again with a back pain and chills before starting so I'm hoping that after reading other reviews i have better results. My best results were when i was given cipro but i guess that is an overall antibiotic and cannot be given for just this problem.
